title: Several Artistic Water Features, Stainless Steel Appliances
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 884 Sq.
Take your luxury living experience to new heights and enjoy views above the city in these high-rise apartments for rent in North Hollywood.
The iconic NoHo 14 community sits in the thriving NoHo Arts District, allowing you to live an elevated lifestyle close to some of the trendiest restaurants, bars and art studios in Los Angeles.

With a modern home that showcases contemporary features and exclusive access to community amenities that are nothing short of extraordinary, you’re well on your way to experiencing the urban lifestyle you deserve.
We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a monthly pet rent of $50 and the pet deposit is $500.00.
There is a weight limit of 50 pounds, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.
Please contact leasing office for details.
